definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
Murray-Darling river system in the southeast of Australia
pinyin: Mo4 lei4 Da2 ling4 liu2 yu4

sentences.english: Part 4 Liao River Basin Water Pollution Prevention recommendations to improve the legal system.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是辽河流域水污染防治。

sentences.english: The Naoli River Watershed is an important breeding area for rare and endangered Oriental White Stork.
sentences.chinese: 挠力河流域是濒危水禽东方白鹳主要繁殖区域。

sentences.english: In addition, the arable land area in Wushuihe river basin was correspondently enlarged during the period of the past 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 从土地利用变化来看，舞水河流域耕地面积不断扩大。

sentences.english: India from Deccan rivers up to Krishna river system.
sentences.chinese: 来自德干河的印度半岛向上到克里希纳河河流域。

sentences.english: This study will help improve the management efficiency of Shiyang River, and provide a scientific reference to river basin water resource management.
sentences.chinese: 以期为石羊河流域水资源有效管理提供科学借鉴。

sentences.english: Yangzikeng watershed began its comprehensive control and exploitation at the beginning of 1992.
sentences.chinese: 杨子坑流域是1992年初开始进行综合治理开发的。

sentences.english: The spatial-temporal changes of landscape features were observed in the watershed.
sentences.chinese: 流域内景观特征表现出一定的时空变化规律。

sentences.english: The first part gives a general introduction of key river basin control project and its management.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分是对流域控制性水工程及其管理的概述。

sentences.english: The river basin administrative organ subordinated to the Ministry of Water Resources undertakes the hydrologic industrial administrative work as empowered by the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 水利部所属流域机构承担部授权的水文行业管理工作。

sentences.english: Taihu Basin was always one of the most developed districts in China.
sentences.chinese: 太湖流域历来是我国经济比较发达地区之一。

sentences.english: Several trans-boundary river basin management systems in the world were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国外多个流域跨界污染管理体系。

sentences.english: Determination of the boundary water quality is an important work in Basin water environment management.
sentences.chinese: 省界水质标准确定是流域环境管理的重要工作。

sentences.english: Fish of larger rivers of China similar to the Mississippi paddlefish.
sentences.chinese: 产于中国大河的匙吻鲟与密西西比河流域中的相似。

sentences.english: Lots of spiteful sharks and other venomous beasts breed all over the basin.
sentences.chinese: 大量的恶意鲨鱼和其他有毒的动物品种全流域。

sentences.english: The water resources are sensitive to the climate change in the Miriverdrainage basin.
sentences.chinese: 弥河流域水资源对气候变化比较敏感。

sentences.english: In the paper, water quality problems in the Tuojiang River Basin are described.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先描述了沱江流域的水质问题。

definition: inland river/river draining to inland sea
Po River, longest river in Italy
